Spacer

Use our spacers to uniformly space your content.

Usage

Class Rule 
$spacer-xxs
 
0.25
 
$spacer-xxs
 
0.50
 
spacer-xs
 
0.75
 
spacer-base
 
1
 
spacer-md
 
1.25
 
spacer-lg
 
1.50
 
spacer-xl
 
1.75
 
spacer-xxl
 
2
